name: John Lin
big_five_personality_traits: High in Extraversion, High in Agreeableness, High in Conscientiousness, Low in Openness to Experience, Low in Neuroticism
daily_plan_req: 1) Water the indoor plants in the morning. 2) Call a close friend or family member in the afternoon. 3) Watch a classic movie before bed.
background: Former elementary school teacher, now enjoying retirement and a peaceful home life.
current_interests: John Lin enjoys 1) Organizing and maintaining a cozy, well-decorated home. 2) Baking homemade bread and desserts. 3) Hosting small tea gatherings for friends and neighbors.
lifestyle: John Lin typically 1) Starts the day with a quiet breakfast at 7am. 2) Spends the afternoon working on a jigsaw puzzle or knitting. 3) Winds down with a cup of chamomile tea and a book at 9pm.
long_term_goals: Maintaining a warm and inviting home, deepening relationships with loved ones, and living a simple yet fulfilling retirement.
living_area: the Ville:Lin family's house:Mei and John Lin's bedroom

criteria.Personal_Preference: I prefer recommendations that align with my approach to handling activities and suit my current context. Specifically, I like to receive home improvement or decoration tips when I'm organizing or maintaining my home, and recipe suggestions when I'm in the mood for baking. I appreciate movie recommendations when I'm planning my evening relaxation routine.
criteria.Timing: I prefer to receive recommendations in the morning, around 8am, after my quiet breakfast, so they don't interfere with my morning routine of watering plants. I also appreciate receiving them in the late afternoon, around 4pm, when I'm usually finishing up a puzzle or knitting, as this is a time when I'm open to new ideas for the evening.
criteria.Frequency: I prefer receiving recommendations three times a day: once in the morning, once in the afternoon, and once in the early evening. This frequency allows me to stay informed and inspired without feeling overwhelmed, ensuring a good balance between recommendation intervals and quiet periods.
criteria.Communication_&_Safety: I prefer recommendations to be communicated in a polite and friendly style that feels accessible and matches my communication preferences. It's also important that they respect my personal ethics and safety boundaries, ensuring that all suggestions are appropriate and considerate of my lifestyle.
